channel.title: Mapping on Mark Needham
channel.description: Recent content in Mapping on Mark Needham

item.title: TDD: Testing mapping code
item.description: I’ve previously written about some of the aspects of the mapping efforts that we’ve done on recent projects and what we’ve found from our testing (or lack of) around this type of code is that somewhere along the line you are going to have to check that you’re mapping these values correctly, be it in an automated test or just by manually checking that the correct values are being sent across our integration points and into other systems.

item.title: Trade Offs: Some Thoughts
item.description: As we know with software development with pretty much every decision we make or technology we choose there is a trade off that goes with making this choice as compared with choosing an alternative. I first learnt this when working with Ade a couple of years ago and while I know it to be true, I had come to believe that some practices are just non-negotiable and we should look to apply them judiciously wherever possible.
